## Description

[Redis](https://redis.io/) is an in-memory data structure store, used as a distributed, in-memory key–value database, cache and message broker.
The **Redis** component provides the ability to create, read, update, and delete data inside a Redis database.

This component returns data that can be used in subsequent steps.

## Connections

### Redis Connection

## Actions

<div id="deletekey" />

### Delete Key

Delete the value of a key | <small><b>key: deleteKey</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      example: "customerId",
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for key of the item.",
      key: "key",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Key",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "redisConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": 1
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="flushall" />

### Flush All

Delete all the keys of all the existing databases, not just the currently selected one | <small><b>key: flushAll</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "redisConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": "OK"
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

### Get Time

Get the local time of the redis server | <small><b>key: getTime</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      key: "redisConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": "2024-05-20T23:01:37.700Z"
}
```

### Keys

Returns all keys matching a specified pattern | <small><b>key: keys</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      example: "customerId",
      required: true,
      comments: "Provide a string value for key of the item.",
      key: "key",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Key",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      key: "redisConnection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": [
    "key1",
    "key2",
    "key3"
  ]
}
```

      required: true,
